ref: 11933 *viśarati ʻ decays, falls to pieces ʼ. [víśāri ʻ is broken, decays, falls to pieces ʼ RV., viśīrṇa -- ʻ broken (of an army) ʼ R., ʻ fallen out (of teeth) ʼ Kāv., viśaraṇa -- n. ʻ dissolution ʼ Dhātup. -- &rcirclemacr Pk. visaraï ʻ falls down, slips ʼ; Or. bisaribā ʻ to be emptied, be lost, be spoilt ʼ; -- Mth. bisarab ʻ to desert ʼ (or < vísarati).
